Blog.post: today was... SIANZ!!! but den oso damn nervous cuz got both chi n sci common test lorx... den can u believe it? iz lyk after readin period liaoz den chi so iz chi test, after chi iz sci leh!!! siao liaoz... i tink chi stil ok lahz, cuz most of e words i noe lahz, but den oridy lost 4 marks liaoz... *sob* *sob* summore tues juz gt hist common test, im prepared to flunk it liaoz, damn fuckin difficult lorx... dunno iz which cher set wan, ask wat y did british surrender to japan... how i noe, i neva read tb dat part, summore hardi oso neva teach us dat part!!! freak lahz... den today sci was lyk, kanasai!!! so damn difficult, i realli dunno how to do lorx... den al rite crap... *sob* *sob* im realli dead... today after sch, shu chun walked to eo bus stop wif me lorx, i keep havin e feelin dat she iz lyk dun wan to interupt min ru n christine den cum n find me lorx... but seriously lahz, dun mind lorx... haiz, i wonder wen did i became lyk dis, maybe cuz all my frenz lyk suddenly vanish into e air lorx... kkz, she oso told me dat i am veri extra lorx... mui hong n xiu wen was lyk together den i always cut in... i noe lahz, but wat can i do... does she understand how it feels lyk to b alone, lonely? i guess she dun... but i oso tink e same way lorx... so frm tml onwards ar, i decided not to go inbetween dem liaoz... i wil go alone, n dat if dey cum find me oso nt my business cuz i didnt cut into dem, iz dey cum find me demselves wan... one more ting, i decided to go on an intensive diet... lolx, cuz nafa cumin, den i dun wan overweight den go e stupid fitness course... so i now everyday do hula hoop for 1/2 hr, 50 tyms sit-up n 300 times skippin rope... n den i try not to eat lunch, dinner eat a little enuf liaoz... most impt, cannot eat snacks!!! trainin --- nw onli twice a wk, den lyk on wkdays always a little pple cum onli lorx, so i dun wan to go for wkdays trainin liaoz... i onli go for sat trainin... so i can - 1) save $$$ cuz no nid stay back in sch to eat 2) concentrate on my studies as trainin takes too much of my time liaoz... 3) no nid so tired, trainin always damn freakin tired wan lorx... haiz, will stop here.. i dun tink i'll b able to rite dis for quite a while lorc... but den will try to... jia you ba sher lin...

haiz, today wake up den my whole body so fuckin pain... ciz yesterday trainin iz physical trainin though always everytym iz oso physical trainin lahz.. but den yesterday iz duck walk these type lorx... den today iz considered half disable... dis mornin went to mac wif my mother n e 2 morons lorx.. i realli dun lyk to go out wif dem leh.. dey r lyk so wat, everything oso dunno everything oso wan to touch as if neva seen before... den my mum iz lyk so damn bias lorx... everythin oso my bro correct, den everything oso i wrong... dunno y my mum lyk dis... den yesterday went to orchard wif jia li, she tel me she got e ticket to 5566 e party 4 m1.. onli 500 pple can go lorx, den she got e ticket frn shee ting... haiz she so good so lucky... den she say maybe e bubble tea shop e uncle mayb got e tickets n wil give her lorx, so i ask her if she gt can gimme.. she say c 1st leh, she say later can sel 100+ dollars lorx.. so i tinkin if she realli treats me as her best fren... i dunno lorx.. i feel dat if she truly treats me as my best fren den wil gimme llorx.. i realli dunno lahz... haiz.. today read min ru's blog, she say dunno hu backstab her lorx, den i gt a veri high feeling iz shu chun n christine lorx, i realli hope so lorx.. maybe say i selfish lahz, but... i dunno lahz... how i wish i dun hv dis type of frenz.... arGHHHH!!! common test cumin lehz, next wk.. gt history, eng, maths sci n chi... everyting in next wk leh.... argh! goin to study to death liaoz...

.x.boy, i realli miss pri sch life!!! i've never been so alone in my life up till now! iz lyk now recess always i 1 person lorx... so damn fuckin lonely! especially wen we went to e stupi fuckin idoit history museum, i sit wif miss teo leh!!! so fuckin idiot, cos i've gt no 1 to sit wif me!!! i'm damn fuckin angry! i realli miss pri sch life, at least in pri sch stil got samantha, jia li n jia xin to accompany me lorx.. den now dun hv liaoz.. i noe i should't blame anyone but den its al dat fuckin idiot bitch fault lorx... wanna noe hus dis bitch? yes, it;s dat fuckin idiot shu chun! i'm gonna hate her for my whole life! she iz damn idiot! she was e one who makes me feel so great havin such a great fren n she was e one hu suddenly walked out of me n even christine did e same thing.. i'm realli damn angry, i juz feel lyk cryin... i've neva felt so alone n helpless, especially when i saw how good christine shu chun n min ru r... dey were al once my best fren.. n now, dey walked out of me, TOGETHER!!! i realli hate dem! i realli dunno wat to do... i realli wish dat i can go to sec 3 immediately so tt i can make new frens n throw away all these frens.. maybe, its my fault for being stubborn too.. i realli cant stand it anymore!!! haiz, enuf abt dat le, now realli got tears in my eyes... today in sch was damn normal lorx... but den gt e stupid chinese compo test.. wat my secret.. how i noe how to rite? i neva rite dis type of compo before..got 1 hr for us to finish e paper but den onli left left den 1/2 hr liaoz, i stil haven even rite 6 lines... suddenly i noe how to rite liaoz den scribble e words lyk mad woman... im prepared to die for these test lorx, im oso prepared to die for chi lorx, coz sch re-open until now gt a few test liaoz, den these test i al juz pass lorx.. so i realli prepare to die lorx... den after sch gt eng remedial which iz damn borin lorx, ask us do stupid ws... wen i reach home ar, wan to watch tv n den wen i watchin, my father cum down n scold non stop lorx.. he so damn idiot lorx... everything oso cannot, watch tv lyk wil die lyk dis... luckily i stil can use com sr, if not sr, i rather everyday stay back in sch den stil dun nid to face 2 moroons... tink got nothin more to rite le.. continue again next tym...

actually nothin much happened today lorx, onli got gys dis morning, den dat cher dunno mr wat lahz, discuss abt petting leh, i oso juz noe wat does petting means lorx... so e xin... den after dta still got stupid trainin lorx, i can tel u ar, today trainin, i realli slack alot leh, its alot alot alot, i didnt realli defend well or catch e re-bound well... such a disgrace, i guess mrs tan muz b thinkin how can i be e captain lorx, play until so slack. zsa zsa better.. if she realli tink zsa zsa better den let zsa zsa b lorx, i oso dun wan to b captain... always kena bully wan... summore muz keep e keys, den sumtyms might even 4get to bring e keys... stupid lahz... now tink ar, realli feel so idiot n stupid of me to choose bball for my cca, i realli regret ALOT now!!! enuf abt it, e more i say, e more i'll tink abt it... after trainin me, audrey n hui qing go eat long john lorx, pearlyn say wanna go, after dat cal n tel me nt goin.. den we eat half way dat tym, she lyk ghost lyk dat appear... dunno wats wrong wif her lahz.. after dat hui qing n audrey went to pierce their ear, iz not at e bottom dere leh, iz at around e bone dere, realli surprised me lorx, andrey so damn guai kia wan oso wil go n pierce e ear, summore dun hv her parents permission leh... hui qing, no nid say wan lahz, she so pai kia wan... dey lyk dis pierce oso made me feel lyk piercing... i noe if i pierce, my parents oso wont blame me wan lorx... dey allow me to pierce.. so good horx... but den i neva piece lorx, coz stil nid go back sch den wen tie my hair can c wan lorx... so decided to wait until e december holidays den pierce... pierce on e right side enuf liaoz... i tink today onli happen lyk dis ba... stop here... ,

today ar, damn suai leh.. is realli suai until cannot suai those type lorX... haiz, today is lyk my parents go msia lahz, den no1 fetch my to sch, obviously, lol... it's lyk, if im nt wrong lahz, 1st tym go sch on a sch day lahz, not lyk trainin lahz... de my hands iz holdin my history tb n wb, dnt wb lorx.. den wen reach bus stop ar, i find my socks too low, so put my bks on e so cal 'bench' n adjust my socks lorx.. after dat no 17 came, lyk so kan cheong wan lorx.. so i juz grab my bks n go up e bus liaoz.. hu noes.. on e bus den realise on my hands onli gt 2 books! 2 bks leh!!! 1 bk went missin liaoz.. sadsadsad.. lucky today hiustory hardi nv cum lorx so no nid scared.. i stil tot maybe e bk at home i nv bring out leh.. but den betsy sms tel me not at home.. so decided to go bkshop buy.. but den bkshop mei you.. bkshop no more den go popular lorx.. hu noes simei popular oso dun hv! so unlucky.. den e lady so kind help me to ask other branches.. den found out dat e onl branch gt iz all e way at orchard leh!! ORCHARD!! wan my to go al e way to orchard juz to buy a bk?? NO WAY! hee hee.. im juz too clever i ask jia li to help me buy den i'll lend her my malay costume... she nids a set wat, so no choice muz go help me buy... hee hee.. so clever ritez? jk.. jk.. den another so suai, i lost e popular card dat xiu wen lend me leh... hope she wont scold me.. aiya, i doubt she will lorx.. she wont blame me wan lahz.. i guess ba.. i realli feel damn lucky leh, i've such a good fren.. aw, suddenly feel miss her so much... hee hee jk jk... wil stop here.. gtg 4 tuition now... ...

actually today nth much happened lorx... go eng remedial den iz lyk so sianz lorx.. dunno do wat make sentences.. sharifah stil tot dat we in pri sch lorx.. dunno how to make sentences.. say iz wat 1pm start 2 pm ends, den i go at around 1.20 cuz go c mrs tan for e bball tingy.. she ask me do lahz, by e tym i start ar, many pple alrdy do halfway liaoz lorx.. so i started anyhow do.. den at lyk around 1.35 ar, i do finish liaoz leh.. of cuz in e klass onli left me n shu chun lorx.. dunno y she do so slow.. so stupid lorx.. onli go lyk 15 mins oso 'shuang'.. i tink her brain realli got big big prob lorx... yay! juz heard frm jane.. no nid help her bring shoes to skul tml.. my maid haven wash hao yet.. so luckily she nv scold me.. phew.. ok back to wat happen today, after skul ar, we do e stupid maths trail tingy.. luckily jezer dere den he help us to tink of e qns though he nt in our grp.. we onli nid to take e measurements n work out e qns onli.. but den onli lyk i 1 person doin all e wk lorx.. dey onli stay dere tok n tok den i do everyting lorx.. maybe nt lahz.. we all took e measurements together but den i solve e qns lahz... it's lyk alrdy soooooooo long i nv sit bus wif xiu wen home liaoz lorx.. den today sit no 9 home wif her.. suddenly feel so great lorx.. actually xiu wen can be a veri good fren wan lorx... but i juz dun understand y she hate shu chun so much.. you shld've seen how shu chun avoid xiu wen when we doin e maths trail tingy lorx.. lyk so funny... as if xiu wen iz e cat den shu chun iz e mouse, wan to hide frm her, dun wan to get bitten.. haha.. i guess i shld be glad to hv these fren lahz.. oso got great teammates cum good fren such as zsa zsa, shu wen n audrey lorx.. dey realli veri good lorx.. i guess i'm really damn lucky ba... N tml at e paragon got sell e 5566 top up card leh.. i wna to go lorx, but den papa mummy not in spore, den dun allow me to go out.. argh!!! stil tink i veri small.. dey even dun allow me to go out n eat wif jane dey al leh.. but den i beri gd in persuading papa to allow me to go leh.. so i can go on sat lorx.. haiz.. today gt freedom leh.. mummy papa nt at home.. lol.. stoppin here...

i realli dunno wat to do leh, dunno y shu chun always ignore me lorx, it's lyk dunno frm my bday onwards? or maybe after e holi lorx.. sumtyms i realli cant stand her lorx.. i guess onli christine understand her ba.. i understand myself too well dat i can do without a particular fren.. juz lyk wen i quarrel wif xiu wen, can last for lyk dunno how mani months, i oso 4get liaoz.. den without her dat tym, i dun realli feel werid or anytingy missin lorx.. but den wen shu chun ignore me ar, i'll feel damn werid llorx.. i dun dare to tink at al dat izzit shu chun has alrdy lyk set a stone into my heart den wen its gone, i'll feel werid but not painful anymore.. i realli dunno leh.. hope dat sum1 wil help me.. i guess i'm juz puttin a brave front in front of her lorx, i dun even tink dat i'm dat brave at all.. e truth iz dat, i'm afraid of being lonely, i dun wan to b alone.. sum how, dere's always lyk sum1 appearin in front of me wenever i nid sum1.. i'm realli afraid dat wen deres a day where no1 wil bother wif me n i'll reali cry out.. but den i dun wan to show dis out, i dun wan to make any of my frenz feel dat i cant do without dem... i realli dun wan, by makin dem feel so, i'll hv no face at al.. maybe, i'm realli concerened abt whether i stil have 'face' anot lorx.. i noe dat i'm reali so.. u noe lahz hor.. but i realil dun wan to show it out lorx.. haiz.. i'm in a lost, dunno wat to do...

haiz, today iz juz another fast day... y izzit dat whenever i wish dat we would haf more tym, the tym flies lyk siao! but den whenever i hope e tym faster ar, e tym crawl lyk e snail!!! today played our last east zone math against bedok view leh! den lose leh.. 22 to dunno 38 or sum wher around dere cuz after e math ar, thank e coach liaoz den wanna c e score dat tym, dey alrdy took it down liaoz so not sure.. *sob* our efforts done frm startin of last yr has gone into e drain lehz.. everyday train lyk siao, den other CCA holi dat tym can no nid go back to skul, den we hv to go back lyk 3 tyms a wk.. not enuf rest at al lorX.. even wen skul reopen liaoz stil hv to train 3 tyms a wk.. coach tink we made of metal wan lorx.. we train lyk siao den in e east zone match stil lose all 3 matches.. makes me wan to cry leh.. i muz admit lorx, iz i realli did nt do my best lorx.. i dunno y leh, always say wan to give my best shot, but den dunno y eveytym juz get e bal ar, wil scared den e ball wil go to e other skul's hand.. argh!! summore, i today got not much strength leh.. 1st 2 quaters stil got a lot of strength but den until 3rd n 4th quarters ar, e bal i snatch oso cant snatch den in e end hold on e bal let e opponent 'throw' me onto e ground lehx... now tink ar, reali.. haiz, i dun let pple snatch away e ball frm me so easily wan lorx.. today realli gt a little crazy... n den lyk dis score ar, tml go back to skul, dunno how to face e stupid edi n royston lorx, sure laugh until lyk crazy wan.. den e mrs tan stil say a lot of rubbish of wat our team spirit veri gd sort of tings, den i tel, can these team spirit help us? as in to make e skul accept sec 1? i dun tink iz able lorx, so wats e point if we hv e team spirit lorx... i muz realli say lorx, e skul better nt disband us, or else ar, i wil realli rite a letter to MOE lorx, c wat e skul can do to us.. n den ar, i tot dat today after match, coach wil treat us to seoul garden, den he ar, juz say bb to us den leave liaoz.. none of us asked him lorX, i tink cuz cher stil dere, dun wanna ask... i oso found out ar, jane sat cum to our trainin iz her last trainin leh.. she has to sit 4 her 'N' level, so sad, we'll miss her wan lorx.. n den today agaist bv, so paiseh leh, play against jia jia, den she lyk made of metal wan, no nid to rest wan, saw her played e whole match, no rest wan.. i tink cuz her skul onli gt a few pple den she has to play lorx, lucky for me, though we hv considered 'less' pple, i stil gt hui qing n zsa2 to change wif me, den i can rest a while.. heehee.. den in skul today was juz normal lorx, nth mch happened iz onli dey hav to go 4 history remedial, den i dun nid cuz i gt match wat, lol.. so happi, no nid go remedial den waste tym which can be used in sleepin.. i tink dats all le.. wil stop here...

haiz... so long neva ritez e blog liaoz, cuz com spoil wat. so ke lian leh, i today sick leh actually nt onli today lorx, yesterday already sick liaoz. dunno y leh. muz b e damn fuckin hot sun lorx. but ii tink ar, cant b leh, normally trainin oso so damn hot, but nt sick leh. den dunno y yesterday reach home liaoz feel giddy, headache den cold lorx. cold of cuz den take temperature lahz, 38.2 degrees leh. so damn happi. hee hee, no nid go trainin today wat. but den afternoon stil gt tuition lorx, tuition cher alrdy cum liaoz wat, cant expect him to go home ritez? den ar, at nite oso nid go tuition centre to tuition wat, i tot i gt fever den no nid go. den my mum says wanna go shoppin wif my maid lah, she seldom go wif us wat [tuition centre beside shoppin centre lorx] den i tink dat since e great spore sales stil on den can help me to buy more clothes wat. den my father say if i stayin at home ar, my maid muz stay at home look after me lorx. he stil tink i stil smal, stil nid sum1 to look after me. my mum wont buy clothes if pple dun give her opnion wan lorx. so i tink if i go tuition ar, my mum can buy me clothes lorx. but den hu noes, she so bias, neva buy any clothes 4 me, onli buy al 4 one of my brother. so bias ritez? nvm if she dun buy 4 me lorx, she oso nv buy 4 my e other brother. so BIAS! den wen i reach home at nite ar, no more fever liaoz lorx, but den hu noes ar, wen i wake up in e mornin, gt fever again! 38.1 argh! so mornin nv go trainin lorx. den since gt nth to do at home ar, i finish watchin finish al e tv shows dat i've recorded wen i cant watch lorx. haha break my record again. nv finish watchin 3 tv shows dat i record in a day. anyway july 8 is my bday lorx. but den nt mani pple noes it lorx. den onli gt 2 present. haiz. anyway i gt big prob lorx. shu chun ask my wat i wan 4 my bday long long ago lorx, lyk at e startin of e yr lorx. den at dat i tym i nv tel her wat i wan lorx. den at e startin of e june holidays lahz, 5566 gt e 'For U' piano score lorx. juz nice she ask me wat i wan wat, so i tel her lahz. on my bday, she realli gave it to me lorx, of cuz she'll ask me if i lyk anot, definetly i told her lyk lahz. after dat, she ask again, dat izzit i already noe dat she's givin my e bk. obviously i told her i noe lahz, iz i tel her to buy wan wat, den she say wat erm.. i'm juz lyk wat christine say lorx. after dat, she juz walk away. i dunno wat christine told her lorx. i tink muz b sumting bad about me. im startin to feel dat christine is startin to hate me lorx. i realli dun understand dem. i tink dats not e onli prob lorx, shu chun is really too imginative lorx, shes lyk always makin a big deal out of nth or over damn small tings. Argh! im realli startin to cant stand her liaoz! i realli dunno if i shld juz treat her as normal fren or stil my best fren. im really damn confused lorx. haiz, i tink dats al le ba...

well, it's a very very long time since i've stop writing. i find it too boring at home lorx, so decided to start writing blogs again. okie, today was SIANZ! i've got nth to do at all. except for dis morning. dis morning, woke up at 630am for trainin [basketball in case u dunno] reached sch a little late, but den hu noes coach was even later. haha finally coach was late once. anyway, wen i reach sch ar, i heard dem say greece won euro leh. how can dat be! summore, i fell asleep at around 52 53 mins DEN... greece score at 57 mins!!! argh!! so angry!! den pearlyn won around $50 leh! hee hee.. luckily i neva buy any bets, if not ar, i sure buy portugal den lose $$ liaoz. hee hee... can save e $$ to buy cd. but den dunno wat cd to buy. wants to buy huang yida, but den also wants to buy FIR leh. so stuck, dunno wat to but. cant expect me to buy both ritez? haiz, today also went to eat seoul garden. coach 'sort of' treat us. actually is we pay half, den coach pay half. den eat until so full almost puke. in seoul garden also saw jeri lorx, but neva say anytingy to her. not even nod my head leh. guess, she forget who i am liaoz ba. ;( reach home den face 2 morons! idiot lorx.. guess who.. my brothers!! e suckers, fuckers!! dun wan to tok. wil onli make me more angry. den i went to slp lorx wake up at 530pm. hee hee, i'm a lazy pig in case u dunno. wake up den help my mum do some idiot tingy which made me so angry!! my mum oso damn frustrated.. so decided to let my father do. giving up. i think dats all le ba. think i'll stop here
